name: Dungeon Time
summary:
A sorcerer known as the Prophet has spilled Chaos into the world. Four weathered adventurers must track him down and find out if it was just a misunderstanding or if the world is really going to end.
Dungeon Time features arcade quality gaming with a sprinkle of smooth mobile controls. Crawl with up to 4 players Co-Op or go just go it alone. Homage to RPG & shmup classics - a top-down shooter with zombies, wizards, demons, and exploding owls.
